title: Enhancing Scientific Thinking Through Literary Inquiry: Reflective Classroom Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level understanding of science and basic literary analysis skills
context.additional_context: Educational course integrating literary analysis techniques to enhance scientific problem-solving skills for current practitioners. Applies reflective teaching methods incorporating learner experiences

learning_goals: Learners can provide three or more multifaceted interpretations of scientific concepts through literary text analysis.
Learners can reflect on their learning process and develop improvement plans using reflective journaling.
Learners can collaborate with peer learners to produce an interdisciplinary report analyzing literature-science integrated themes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
